description: Variation of condition 9 of listed building consent dated 19 June 2020 (RN: 20/01660/COLBC) for alterations and repairs to windows, roof, brickwork, rain water and soil vent pipes, and main entrance door and internal alterations including replacement of front entrance doors of flats and associated works; Namely, to allow the removal of pointing using mechanical disk cutting tools as well as hand bolstering.
